product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner presents an elegant jewelry promotional design with a luxurious and romantic feel. The layout is split diagonally with the left half featuring a soft blush pink background and the right half showcasing a deep maroon gradient. Central to the composition is a pair of ornate rose gold stud earrings (represented by the "product_image") placed at an angle for visual impact. Prominently styled headlines ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in bold classic serif fonts reinforce the premium feel, while the "subheading" adds a descriptive product line. Supporting points ("description") highlight key features in a bullet-style list. The pricing ("price") is large and bold for prominence, while a rectangular light pink call-to-action button ("cta_background") with contrasting dark text ("cta") invites immediate action. The overall design blends luxury and femininity.

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink: `#F5C4C9`
- Deep Maroon: `#4A1A24`, `#7D2D35`
- Blush Gradient: `#F5C4C9 → #E8A3A8`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases elegant circular earrings designed with a delicate blend of rose gold and crystal-clear stones. The dominant rose gold (#F7A2A7) frame offers a warm, luxurious base, beautifully contrasted by sparkling white gemstones (#FFFFFF) that add brilliance and clarity. Subtle blush pink accents (#FAD1D5) within the teardrop shapes enhance the feminine appeal. The metallic sheen adds depth, using light reflections to highlight contours and textures. These colors are well-balanced, with the cool white gemstones softly piercing through the warm pink tones, creating an ethereal elegance. This palette would make a perfect base for an ad banner with soft, romantic aesthetics.
